name: Computerbase Dark Overhaul (+ XenForo) v1.5.2
description:
An almost complete dark / grey overhaul for german Computerbase news / community page. 

Includes also style for XenForo board software (currently 2.1)! Also download section, tests, news and personal messages in forum are modified!
additional_info:
May 18, 2018 - v1.0 - initial release v1.0
May 18, 2018 - v1.1 - minor changes in overall readability, images, signatures and quotes
May 19, 2018 - v1.2 - minor but important changes in readability of notification + user list!
May 28, 2018 - v1.3 - some changes in readability and fixed font color in polls
May 30, 2018 - v1.4 - minor changes at user information boxes and also improved readability in polls
Feb 07, 2019 - v1.5 - minor changes for newest Computerbase XenForo update v2.1 (new "Emoji-reactions")
May 31, 2019 - v1.5.1 - minor changes in readability, especially for tests / articles
Oct 04, 2019 - v1.5.2 - Köf3 is now Taron, username changed
*******************************************************************************************************

I still appreciate every constructive feedback on both Stylish and computerbase!

*******************************************************************************************************

Hint: almost all Social media links, hashtags and boxes are hide in this style. To change this, please change in CSS style itself.

Unfortunately some minor things are not easily changeable only in CSS, so not every little detail is consistent to the overall dark theme.
